bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of dan du 丹毒 , cinnabar poison, growing like a snake around one’s waist. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 quotes Ji ji fang 濟急方 : 纏蛇丹毒：馬蘭、甘草擂醋搽之 , “ Twining-snake cinnabar poison : apply ma lan and gan cao pounded with vinegar to it”. Chan shi shang pao 產時傷脬 , bladder damage at the time of birth [1]

Pathological Condition identical with chan fu pao sun 產婦脬損 , a delivering woman’s bladder damage. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry juan 絹：產時傷脬，終日不小便，只淋濕不斷 , “ Bladder damage at the time of birth [causes that woman] to be unable to pass urine all day long, with only an unceasing trickling of moisture instead”.
